input_email_body:
Subject: Concern Regarding Financial Data Analytics Tool

Dear Support Team, I am writing to report an issue with the Financial Advisory Data Analysis Tool My name is Omar Hassan.. The tool is not providing accurate optimization results for investments as expected. I have tried updating the software and reviewing error logs, but the problem persists. Possible causes of the issue might include software integration problems or outdated input data. I would appreciate your support in resolving this problem. Please let me know if additional information is needed You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. Thank you for your understanding and assistance.
